patthana15.30:1.1: Lokiyaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nalokuttaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.30:2.1: Lokiyaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nalokuttaro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
patthana15.30:3.1: Lokiyaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nalokiyo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
